Package services

Class AppointmentRequestService

java.lang.Object
services.AppointmentRequestService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAppointmentRequestService
public class AppointmentRequestService extends Object implements IAppointmentRequestService
Service class for handling appointment requests in the healthcare system. This class provides methods to accept, decline, and process appointment requests, as well as to save and retrieve appointment request data from a CSV file.

    • saveAppointmentRequest

      public void saveAppointmentRequest(AppointmentRequest request)
      Saves an appointment request to the CSV file by appending it. Ensures that new requests are added under the header line.
      Specified by:
      saveAppointmentRequest in interface IAppointmentRequestService
      Parameters:
      request - The appointment request to be saved.

    • save

      public void save(AppointmentRequest request)
      Saves an `AppointmentRequest` to the specified CSV file.

      The request is appended to the file in a new line. If the file does not exist, it will be created. The `toString` method of `AppointmentRequest` is used to format the data for saving.

      Parameters:
      request - the `AppointmentRequest` object to save

    • getAllRequests

      public List<AppointmentRequest> getAllRequests()
      Loads all appointment requests from the CSV file.
      Specified by:
      getAllRequests in interface IAppointmentRequestService
      Returns:
      A list of all appointment requests.
